answers.answer: I'm also getting induced. I go in tonight so they can prep me and then tomorrow morning they will start the induction. I'm nervous too! Just ready to get the labor part over! I'm 39 weeks today but my baby girl is measuring big due to my gestational diabetes.
My baby girl us measuring big too for the same reason :/

question: Found out today that i might get induced at 38 weeks...im nervous but at the same time im excited to meet her! I should know by next Tuesday if they will induce me or not depending on my ultrasound this friday.. and how well all my testing goes..
title: possible induction
